column4: hey guys- ive been using apt-get lately, but it keeps asking for a ubunutu cd i dont got.
how can i make it stop doing that?
is it something i could do in synaptic too?
logical- there isnt a good one
it was closed down by apple not too long ago
i suggest you use rythm box to upload to your ipod
and i suggest you anti-drm your itunes music first
well I dont have an Ipod
I just have a crap load of music so and itunes organizes it so well and search is great
did you buy it from itunes logical?
cause if you did and dont anti-drm , you cant play that music on linux.
no I didnt buy it from itunes
I just like the way itunes organizes my music and its interface is great
